thread.title: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K
thread.title_full: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K

title: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K
text: > North Carolina Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K FILE - In this Oct. 28, 2014, file photo, San Antonio Spurs' Gregg Popovich, left, celebrates with owner Peter Holt, right, after they received their NBA championship rings prior to an NBA basketball game between the Spurs and the Dallas Mavericks in San Antonio. Popovich, who has led the San Antonio Spurs to five NBA titles, will replace Mike Krzyzewski as the U.S. basketball coach following the 2016 Olympics. (AP Photo/Eric Gay, File)
